title: Pipes, plug-ins, plumbing: VCs gung-ho on embedded finance startups, but a word of caution - YourStory
content: Pipes, plug-ins, plumbing: VCs gung-ho on embedded finance startups, but a word of caution  YourStory
description: As money pours into the embedded finance sector, YourStory speaks to top VCs in the space on the key future trends, their views on embedded finance infrastructure startups, also known as pipes,  and advice for them.
